INSERT INTO literature_rule (id, department, year, type, min, max, score1, score2, score3, score4, score5, score6, score7, score8) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.department}, #{item.year}, #{item.type}, #{item.min}, #{item.max}, #{item.score1}, #{item.score2}, #{item.score3}, #{item.score4}, #{item.score5}, #{item.score6}, #{item.score7}, #{item.score8})
